titles: This lytell treatyse compendiously declareth the damage and destruction in realmes caused by the serpente of diuision.
author: Lydgate, John, 1370?-1451?
publisher: Newly and of late imprinted by me Roberte Redman, dwellynge at London in Flete Strete at the sygne of the George,
notes: Attributed to Lydgate by STC (2nd ed.).
"Thus endeth this lytell treatyse entytuled the Damage and destruction in realmes"--Colophon.
Publisher statement taken from colophon; date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Exeter College (University of Oxford). Library.
